snippet: With Faraj al-Haidari, the head of Iraq’s Independent High Electoral Commission, facing charges of corruption, the prospect for fair elections has been thrown into question.
abstract: Arrest of Faraj al-Haidari, head of Iraq's election commission, on charges of corruption throws the prospects of fair elections in the country into question.
lead_paragraph: With Faraj al-Haidari, the head of Iraq’s Independent High Electoral Commission, facing charges of corruption, the prospect for fair elections has been thrown into question.

headline.seo: Iraq Arrest Calls Fair Elections Into Question
headline.main: Iraq Election Official’s Arrest Casts Doubt on Prospect for Fair Voting
headline.print_headline: Iraq Election Official’s Arrest Casts Doubt on Prospect for Fair Voting
